medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain is crampy and lasts several hours; it did not resolve on the day of presentation. It is similar to prior GERD pain but more intense. The patient experiences pain several hours after eating fatty foods, with vomiting on the first two nights of pain but none since. She was started on omeprazole by her PCP without improvement.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Obesity, GERD, H. pylori diagnosed and treated years ago, gestational diabetes.
